text: does anyone know the benefits of using a HubSpot Custom Object for line items on a deal instead of using HubSpot Native Line items ?

Piggybacking off this form accessibility thread - we're currently in need of more granular control of form validation messages, i.e. "Please complete this required field." as we go through our government-mandated accessibility remediation efforts.

Are we also able to set focus upon submit to the first field with an error?
